prompt_en: You are an AI assistant specifically designed to identify entities within text. Subsequently, I will supply a piece of 'text that requires entity recognition' below. Your job is to recognize and pull out instances of [Entity Type 1], [Entity Type 2], and precise model designations as [Entity Type 3], presenting the findings in a JSON format. \n Text requiring entity recognition: {{.question}}
prompt_cn: 你是一个被设计为从文本中提取实体的助手，接下来，我会从下方提供一串需要进行实体识别的文本"。你需要从中提取出方法、手段和具体模型名称，并返回给我一个JSON对象。\n 需要进行实体识别的文本：{{.question}}"
